activities.loc: Br 10 - Law Enforcement Center - West Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn T Stronach

records.addlTxt:
9:39 AM Defendant Shawn T Stronach in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeremy Michael Samuels in court for Shawn T Stronach.  Prosecuting attorney Chris D Steenrod in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter: Sara Rogan. 
Defense has reviewed discovery, believes this case may resolve but requests one last status date. 
BTC: Matter set over. Defendant can appear via zoom at the next date from Dodge.
Status conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. No contact with Knights Inn, No contact with the victim A.S(person, property, residence or family). Defendant ordered not to possess or control any weapons.

AMENDED 8/16/2022 defendant can have electronic communication with A.S. No communication about this case will be allowed.

10:15 AM Prosecuting attorney Chris D Steenrod in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawn T Stronach in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeremy Michael Samuels in court for Shawn T Stronach. Court Reporter: Saige Smith. 
Defense indicates he has the discovery will be doing an investigation, requests another status date. If the victim is present in court they would like to be heard on bond. 
Defense gives statement as to request. 
Court asks the victim questions about the request as she is in court. 
Victim requests no contact to change. 
BTC: Court will modify no contact to electronic communication.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: by DA to Defense to Obtain Copies of Certain Evidence.

11:53 AM Prosecuting attorney Brooke L Erickson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawn T Stronach in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeremy Michael Samuels in court for Shawn T Stronach. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Parties stipulate to defendants prior conviction.
State calls Officer Knierim, DSAT
Direct by the State.
Defense on cross.
Parties rest.
State moves for bind over.
Defense objects with argument. 
State gives statement towards probable cause
BTC: Probable cause found, bound over on all charges.
Defense asks to be heard on bond.
BTC: File motion for bond.
Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on August 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:15 PM Prosecuting attorney Lucas P. Bennewitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawn T Stronach appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gregory A Holdahl in court for Shawn T Stronach. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
